amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on paying the costs of the war with Iraq.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 479 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 18. Record Vote Number: 121.
Amendment SA 479 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S4781, S4785-4786; text: CR S4781) To express the sense of the Senate on paying the costs of the war with Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 479 proposed by Senator Hollings.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 479 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 18. Record Vote Number: 121.
